Hi Martin. Javascript needs to be loaded for the CTA to be fully functional. It is advised you use the CTA embed code, or CTA HubL code if you’re trying to embed a CTA.

Side note please refrain from tagging HubSpotters. We love to help but understand this slack is not an official support channel it is a peer to peer community.
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/slack/code-of-conduct#HubSpot-support-expectations>
